task.title: Configuring HTTP Redirect
task.shortdesc: To help direct users to the correct protocol/port the management console is running on (especially when SSL is enabled), you can configure the console to listen on a standard HTTP port. When the user enters a a non-SSL URL (http:// instead https://), they will be automatically redirected to the proper URL.

step.cmd: Modify the http.redirect entry in the [server] section of the configuration file to True to enable HTTP redirect.
